testsuite.name: com.paysecure.admin.manageRoles

testcase.name: verifyUserIDInResetPasswordFunctionality
testcase.system-out: User Click on Username Or Merchant name text Field User enter Username or merchant Name :- tomjerry User Click on the search Button After searching the role, user gets username: tomjerry_3d After searching the role, user gets Assigned Role: MERCHANT User click on the Reset Password Functionality Verify USEDID is matching on the Reset password User enter passowrd in password field User Verify :-Atleast one small and one capital letter, one digit, one special character

testsuite.system-out: User enter ID in Username field User Enter Password in password field Click on submit button in login page User Click on Main Module - Manage Roles User is on the Manage Roles Main Module User Click on Username Or Merchant name text Field User enter Username or merchant Name :- tomjerry User Click on the search Button After searching the role, user gets username: tomjerry_3d After searching the role, user gets Assigned Role: MERCHANT User click on the Reset Password Functionality Verify USEDID is matching on the Reset password User enter passowrd in password field User Verify :-Atleast one small and one capital letter, one digit, one special character
